name: FRITanks
description:
FRITanks is an action packed tank game, where you have to use tactics to defeat your enemies. The game gets progressively harder when you unlock new levels. You can replay the game however many times you want.

V1.0

Your tank is fully upgradable. In the future I might add new skins for tanks and different stats.

Replayability is there, but in the future, the level will get harder when you beat it.

Gameteam presents
Fritanks
Featuring Jani Kacic et al
Done within TINR course
Faculty of Computer and Information Science
University of Ljubljana
Slovenia
2021
